column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Two things: It’s Tuesday and it’s Infrastructure Week. Now it being Tuesday actually means something. Joan McCarter will be here. Infrastructure Week though. Well that could mean anything. Or nothing. Or some mysterious heretofore unknown linkage of the two. Heaven forfend! Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
